featured.text: It is not ESPN, the all-sports cable network, or even MTV, which is famous for its music videos.
He marketed his brand by giving clothes to famous MTV stars and featuring teen stars in his print ads.

definition.zh_def: 音樂電視網，一個以音樂視頻為主的電視網絡。
definition.en_def: A television network primarily focused on music videos.
definition.example: MTV revolutionized the way music was consumed by introducing music videos to a wider audience.
